text: UTV News is a television channel broadcasting news only, updated every minute, from Tirana, Albania. Originally started as Teuta TV based in Durrës, it was re-branded to UFO TV. The station is affiliated with UFO Albanian University in Tirana, Albania.UTV News http://www.albanianuniversity.al/televizioni-utv- news ==TV programs made and broadcast by UTV News== {| class="wikitable" !
